p: SDG goal 3 redefines the child mortality target to include fixed numerical targets for neonatal mortality (NMR) (≤ 12/1,000 live births) and U5MR (< 25/1,000 live births) and the elimination of preventable child deaths between birth and age five by 2030. The SDG framework as a whole requires inclusion—attention to subgroups that may be missing from traditional measurement systems or different in consequential ways from the population as a whole.
